questions.question: A player is allowed to touch the net while in play

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: To perform an underhand serve, a player should

choices.answer: Keep ball below waistline with hitting arm staight pulled back to hit
Both arms straight with hands cupped together to hit
Trophy stance with throw arm in front and 90 degree hit arm pulled back
Diamond shape hand position above, thumbs down and palms out after hit

questions.question: To make a point in volleyball, the player needs to

choices.answer: To hit the ball to an opposing player on otherside of net in play area
Hit to an open space on other side of the net in the play area
To hit the ball outside the boundary (play) area
None of the above

questions.question: To perform an Overhead Set, a player should

choices.answer: Keep ball below waistline with hitting arm staight pulled back to hit
Both arms straight with hands cupped together to hit
Trophy stance with 90 hit arm pulled back
Diamond shape hand position above, thumbs down and palms out after hit

questions.question: To perform an forearm bump, a player should

choices.answer: Keep ball below waistline with hitting arm staight pulled back to hit
Both arms straight with hands cupped together to hit
Trophy stance with 90 degree hit arm pulled back
Diamond shape hand position above, thumbs down and palms out after hit

questions.question: The maximum amount of hits a team can make before having to rally is

choices.answer: One
Three
Five
Unlimited

questions.question: A player is allowed to hit the ball more than once in row

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: The maximum amount of players allowed on court for volleyball is

choices.answer: Three
Five
Six
Unlimited

questions.question: To make a ball move in forward and downward movement, a player should

choices.answer: Hit or throw an object at angle below to add bottomspin
Hit or throw and object at an angle above to add topspin
Hit directly below the object
Hit directly on top of the object

questions.question: Server must be behind the baseline (backline) to put ball in play

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: To make a ball move in a forward and upward movement, a player should

choices.answer: Hit or throw an object at angle below to add bottomspin
Hit or thrown an object at an angle above to add topspin
Hit directly below the object
Hit directly above the object

questions.question: To perform an Overhand serve, a player should

choices.answer: Keep ball below waistline with hitting arm staight pulled back to hit
Both arms straight with hands cupped together to hit
Trophy stance with throw arm in front and 90 degree hit arm pulled back
Diamond shape hand position above, thumbs down and palms out after hit
